item.description:
“This is the largest group of people ever assembled in one place, and I think you people have proven something to the world: that a half a million kids can get together and have three days of fun and music and have nothing *but* fun and music, and I God bless you for it!”
Max Yasur

From the Brattle Theatre Website:
Brattle Theatre Calender
Special Event
40th Anniversary! Free Screening!
Elements Of Cinema
Woodstock
at 11:00am
(Restored Blu-ray screening)
(1970) dir Michael Wadleigh, [228 min]
One of the defining moments of the hippie generation and one of the definitive concert films, WOODSTOCK has been re-issued to commemorate the 40th anniversary of this landmark musical event. For August’s “Elements Of Cinema”, we’ll be featuring a one-off screening of the newly remastered Blu-ray edition of this landmark film.

As a music collector, I have seen bits and pieces of "Woodstock". So, seeing the whole movie on the big screen is going to be interesting. I look forward to the discussions that we will have after this movie.

Walter
item.how_to_find_us: As always, I will be in front of the screen after the show
item.name: "Woodstock" Director's Cut at the Brattle-Free Screening
